text: Air India Express Flight IX-812 was a passenger flight of Air India from Dubai International Airport that crashed on 22 May 2010 at Mangalore International Airport. The time of the crash was UTC+5:30 local time. The airplane went beyond the area of the runway and crashed. The accident killed about 160 people. ==Plane== The aircraft was a Boeing 737-800. Its first flight was on 20 December 2007. ==References== Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in 2010 Category:2010 in India Category:2010s disasters in India Category:Karnataka Category:May 2010 events Category:Transport in India
title: Air India Express Flight 812
